name: Racing Pigs - An Amazing Speedy Race
name_original: Racing Pigs - An Amazing Speedy Race
description:
Pigs fly, they just don't do it often - only when they are RACING!

Choose your favorite RACING PIG and get airborne on this amazing racing game! Use the hills to gain speed, jump through the skies and land perfectly - if you do it right enough times, you might reach the skies and fly above the clouds! Compete against 3 other pigs for a place in the podium and use Nitros to pass them easily! Won the race? Share the video replay with your Facebook friends!

This crazy championship will take you on a journey to the warm countryside, the fast metropolis and even the beautiful snowy mountains. Play as legendary racers like the magical Harry Pig, the electric Pigachu and the amazing Super Pig!

Jump on this awesome race and be the fastest RACING PIG ever!

FEATURES:
• 20 Amazing Pigs!
• 30 Adrenaline-fueled Levels
• Awesome Nitro powerup
• 3 Unique Worlds
• Easy to play
• Incredible art
• Amazing music
• Highly addictive gameplay
• Share your videoreplay over Facebook
• Free updates with more levels!

Have fun!
